comments.body: soooooo...jimp is now just mostly broken?

comments.body: It's funny, because I added `jimp` to our user suite, because I'd had issues in the past where they shipped broken types. And it looks like they are again~ Someone'a already working on it: https://github.com/oliver-moran/jimp/pull/786
